headline: Caterpillar’s AI Data Center Engine Bet Could Be A Game Changer For Caterpillar (CAT)
summary: Caterpillar Inc. is presenting at CES 2026 in Las Vegas this week, with CEO Joseph Creed and senior technology leaders showcasing the Cat AI Nexus and other Industrial AI and autonomous worksite solutions. The company is pairing this technology push with a US$725 million investment to expand large-engine capacity for data center power, underscoring how AI-related energy demand is reshaping its business mix. We’ll now explore how Caterpillar’s large-engine investment for AI data centers may...

headline: Industrial Stocks Are Flying Despite Lousy Data. Here’s Why.

headline: Dow Surges to Record High, Touching 49,000 for First Time
summary: The Dow on Monday surged north of 49,000 for the first time.  The blue-chip index rallied 651 points, or 1.4%.  Following the U.S.'s capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, Wall Street was favoring consumer discretionary, financials, energy, industrials, communication services, and materials.

headline: Is It Worth Investing in Caterpillar (CAT) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Caterpillar (CAT) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Assessing Caterpillar (CAT) Valuation As AI Data Center Demand Drives Power Expansion Investment
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) is back in focus after highlighting rapid growth in its power and energy business, supported by AI driven data center demand and a planned US$725 million engine capacity expansion. See our latest analysis for Caterpillar. The 4.46% 1 day share price return to US$598.41 adds to a 22.95% 90 day share price return. The 1 year total shareholder return of 66.79% indicates strong, building momentum around Caterpillar’s earnings and AI driven power investments. If you are looking...
